name: layers.exe
description:
Original Release Date: October 2014

layers.exe was a 2014 Halloween special released during the middle of the ".exe" craze. This game had to happen sooner or later, given it was also the time period "Shrek is Love, Shrek is Life" was popular. Many people played it. I later removed the game after Halloween ended, much to many fans' dismay. What an idiot I was.

Shrek belongs to Dreamworks Studios.
